response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value, not just financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits that cater specifically to your needs. Given its significance, I propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time, you can secure this product at an exclusive price of $750,000. This offer is designed to recognize your interest and commitment, ensuring that you benefit from an unparalleled experience while also providing you with substantial savings. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
